alert.note: Alert for Greene; Perry; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 11:27PM CST until January 04 at 12:15AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1215 AM CST. * At 1126 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Richton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Richton, State Line and Buckatunna. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for southwestern Alabama.
